column4: Critics due to get EU's Google antitrust charge sheet this week: sources
column5: BRUSSELS Microsoft  German publisher Axel Springer and 17 other critics of Google are expected to get a copy of the EU's antitrust charge sheet against the search engine giant this week in order to allow them to provide feedback  four people familiar with the matter said on Tuesday.

column4: Critics due to get EU's Google antitrust charge sheet this week - sources
column5: BRUSSELS  June 16 Microsoft  German publisher Axel Springer and 17 other critics of Google are expected to get a copy of the EU's antitrust charge sheet against the search engine giant this week in order to allow them to provide feedback  four people familiar with the matter said on Tuesday.
